DOC.brief_title: ALK21-003 : Study Medisorb® Naltrexone ( VIVITROL® ) Alcohol-Dependent Adults
DOC.detailed_description: All subject receive standardized biopsychosocial support therapy ( BRENDA Approach [ Volpicelli , JR [ 2001 ] ; Guilford Press : New York ] ) visit . Subjects complete study ( ie , receive 6 injection study drug complete study visit ) continue meet eligibility criterion give option enroll extension study ALK21-003EXT ( NCT01218971 ) . A second extension , Study ALK21-010 ( NCT00156923 ) , conduct subsequent ALK21-003EXT .
